note.p: Education: Trinity College, Cambridge. BA (1864), MA
Career: Fellow of Trinity College, Cambridge (1864); called to the Bar (1874); Plumian Professor of Astronomy and Experimental Philosophy, Cambridge University (1883)
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc Series A 1913-1914 vol 89 pp i-xiii signed by S S H
References: James R Moore, 'On the Education of Darwin's Sons: The Correspondence Between Charles Darwin and the Reverend G V Reed, 1857-1864' in NR 1977-8 vol 32 pp 51-70
